title: The Dow just posted its best winning streak since the 1980s. Why it keeps going higher
description: The Dow on Wednesday rose for a 13th straight day, matching its longest winning streak since 1987.

title: Chipotle sales rise but fall short of Wall Street's expectations
description: Chipotle's stock has climbed 50% year to date.

title: Volkswagen buys stake in Xpeng, will jointly develop two new EVs with the Chinese automaker
description: The new EVs, which will be branded as VWs and sold only in China, are expected to launch in 2026.

title: Tesla under investigation by California attorney general over Autopilot safety, marketing
description: The California attorney general is investigating Tesla over the electric car company's driver assistance technology, CNBC has learned.

title: Hunter Biden pleads not guilty to charges after judge questions revised plea deal
description: Judge Maryellen Noreika, an appointee of former President Donald Trump, put the proceedings on hold as she asked the parties to work out their dispute.

title: Boeing’s Starliner losses total $1.5 billion with NASA astronauts still waiting to fly
description: Since 2014, when NASA awarded Boeing with a fixed-price contract to develop Starliner, the company has recorded losses on the program almost every year.

title: UK investigates weight loss, diabetes drugs like Wegovy and Ozempic for suicide risks
description: The probe into potentially life-threatening side effects comes as the drugs skyrocket in popularity in the U.S. and draw heightened investor interest.

title: Fed approves hike that takes interest rates to highest level in more than 22 years
Meta to report second-quarter earnings after the bell
description: In Meta's quarterly earnings report, analysts will be looking to see whether the company's online ad business continues to show improvement.

title: Trump says 'we'll have fun' at 'trial of the century' as election case indictment looms
description: Donald Trump is a target of a criminal probe by special counsel Jack Smith over efforts to reverse the 2020 electoral win of President Joe Biden.

title: 'Barbie' box office dominance extends beyond the weekend
description: "Barbie" continues to drive ticket sales at movie theaters following its historic opening weekend.

title: Amazon offers concessions to UK antitrust watchdog as part of probe into its marketplace practices
description: Amazon on Wednesday offered commitments to the U.K. Competition and Markets Authority to address the British competition watchdog's concerns.

title: Alphabet shares jump on beat and strong cloud growth
description: The company reported strong growth in its cloud computing unit and announced a key executive would be moving to a new role.

title: Gap taps top Mattel executive to be its new CEO
description: Richard Dickson, Mattel's president and chief operating officer credited with reviving the Barbie franchise, was selected to be Gap's new chief executive.

title: A CEO quits and the BBC apologizes to Trump-ally Nigel Farage. A banking scandal erupts in Britain
description: NatWest Group CEO Alison Rose resigned on Wednesday after a media storm over the termination of Brexit figurehead Nigel Farage's bank account.

title: Boeing swings to a loss on defense unit trouble, but airplane deliveries pick up pace
description: Boeing said Wednesday that it is transitioning to higher production of its best-selling Max aircraft, at a pace of 38 jets a month.

title: Meta, Microsoft and Amazon team up on maps project to crack Apple-Google duopoly
description: Overture Maps Foundation is trying to collect enough data so that companies can build maps they own and operate rather than paying Google and Apple.

title: Moody's sees 'significant risk' besieging Israel's economy
description: Moody's Investors Service cautioned that "significant risk" looms over Israel's economy, after the passage of a law that curtails the Supreme Court's powers.

title: Samsung launches two new folding smartphones to fend off competition from rivals
description: Samsung on Wednesday launched two new folding smartphones, the Galaxy Z Flip 5 and Galaxy Fold 5.

title: A vital system of ocean currents could collapse much sooner than expected, scientists warn
description: Scientists have previously sounded the alarm over studies showing a rapid slowdown of the Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation.

title: Rolls-Royce shares soar 19 % after engine-maker raises guidance
description: The company said it anticipates half-year profits, due out on Aug. 3, will be more than double market consensus.

title: Senate passes toned-down bill to increase oversight of investments in Chinese technology
description: This rare bipartisan agreement underscores U.S. worries over China's development of advanced technology in an intensifying global battle for tech supremacy.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Alphabet soars as Microsoft sinks
description: Both Alphabet and Microsoft beat estimates for the top and bottom line. But Alphabet shares soared while Microsoft fell.

title: Jeep, Dodge maker Stellantis posts first-half revenue jump, confirms 2023 guidance
description: Global battery electric vehicle and low emission vehicle sales were up 24% and 28% year-on-year, respectively.

title: SK Hynix posts narrower second-quarter loss amid robust AI demand, sees chip recovery
description: SK Hynix in its latest earnings report said that the weak memory chip market is starting to recover amid robust artificial intelligence demand.

title: Deutsche Bank beats expectations despite 27% drop in profit, jump in costs
description: The bank's net profit attributable to shareholders slightly topped a prediction of 737 million euros in a Reuters poll of analysts.

title: Paris company listings raise 92% less in 2023, research says, but London holds up
description: Research by KPMG showed a mixed picture for 2023 so far, with sentiment clouded by higher interest rates and price pressures for consumers.

title: Weight loss drug Wegovy is from Europe — but users in the region face a long and costly wait
description: The hugely popular Wegovy obesity drug will be launched in Germany this month, but high costs and supply constraints threaten to weigh heavy on the rollout.

title: Britain's richest man says Brexit was 'not good for the UK,' backs PM Sunak's economic plans
description: Britain's wealthiest man, Gopichand Hinduja, condemned the U.K.'s departure from the European Union, but threw his backing behind PM Rishi Sunak.

title: IMF raises growth forecast for India, which is set to be fastest growing major economy in 2023
description: China and India will power emerging Asia's world-leading economic growth in 2023.

title: China signals more support for real estate with a 'big change' in tone
description: China has changed its tone on the country's struggling real estate sector, signaling that more policy support may be on the way.

title: Singapore's sovereign wealth fund posts robust returns but says inflation remains 'sticky'
description: GIC cautioned the global economy faces headwinds from tight monetary and fiscal policies.

title: What happened to the Chinese travel boom everyone was waiting for? It stayed in China
description: Rather than a boom, the recovery of international travel in China is likely to be spread out over 2023 and 2024, says Mastercard economist David Mann.

title: Elon Musk's X rebrand reignites his goal to turn Twitter into an app like China's WeChat
description: Elon Musk officially changed Twitter's famous bird logo to an "X" in his bid to make the service into "the everything app."
